title: License Description
description: This license acknowledges and supports the efforts of FlyEnv and its authors. It is not intended to restrict users, but to encourage respect for the developersâ€™ work and intellectual property. Please ensure you obtain a valid license before using FlyEnv for commercial purposes.

restrictions.title: Users without a license will be subject to the following restrictions:

items.0: A maximum of three sites can be created.
items.1: The AI chat feature is available for a trial period of three days only.
items.2: Additional restrictions may apply to future features.

howToObtain.title: How to Obtain a License
howToObtain.description: FlyEnv provides flexible ways to obtain a license. Users can choose any of the following methods to apply:

0.title: Donate to the Project
0.description: There is no fixed amount required for donations. Considering the varying economic situations of users in different countries (e.g., many users are students), please choose an amount that is comfortable for you.

1.title: Contribute to Development
1.description: Participate in the project by submitting a Pull Request. Regardless of the amount of code, as long as it positively improves the project (e.g., fixing a translation error), your contribution counts.

2.title: Promote the Project
2.description: Promote FlyEnv by sharing your experience in articles, videos, blogs, vlogs, or comments. Authentic user feedback is preferred. Content can be in any language and on any platform.

submitInfo: After completing any of the above methods, please fill in the results in the input box below and click the 'Request License' button to submit your application. License requests are usually processed within 24 hours.
messagePlaceholder:
Please submit the donor, donation link, or order ID when choosing to donate.
Please submit the PR link for those who choose to participate in project development.
Please submit a link to your article, video, blog, vlog, or comment for those who choose to promote.
licenseInfo: The current provided license is a permanent license, each computer corresponds to one license. If you change computers, you need to bind the new device's uuid in 'My Licenses', or apply for a new license.
logoutTips: Are you sure you want to log out?
delBindTips: Are you sure to unbind the license from this UUID?
addBindTips: Are you sure to bind the license to this UUID?
oauthSuccessMessage: This page can be closed. Please return to FlyEnv to view the license information.
